column1: Smoque BBQ////I have not gone there yet
column2: as I've only had it as a take out order that someone else has gone to pick up.  I'm a huge fan of brisket
column3: so I've only had their sliced brisket sandwiches
column4: but both times they were to die for!  To me there is nothing special about their mac & cheese
column5: but I LOVE their coleslaw!  I am a huge fan of vinegar based coleslaw and their is so good I can't stop eating it!  If you like creamier coleslaw
column6: you will not like this one.
